text: Weekend at Bernie's is a 1989 American black comedy movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and stars Andrew McCarthy, Jonathan Silverman. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:1989 comedy movies Category:1980s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff
title: Weekend at Bernie's
